author: William Ebbs
title: China Tries to Dodge Blame by Doubling Down on Coronavirus Conspiracies
description: China is spreading conspiracy theories about the origin of Wuhan's coronavirus. U.S. ambassador Cui Tiankai refuses to refute the claims and some Chinese officials have directly spread conspiracies. The post China Tries to Dodge Blame by Doubling Down on Coro…
content:
• The Chinese Communist Party is trying to dodge blame for its mishandling of the coronavirus pandemic.
  • China is spreading misinformation suggesting the disease originated in the United States.
